name.en: Ministry of Social Solidarity and Justice (Egypt)

description.en: The Ministry of Social Solidarity and Justice is the main registration body for associations and foundations in Egypt.

access.onlineAccessDetails: The NGO Portal provides a list of associations, along with registration dates and registration numbers.
access.guidanceOnLocatingIds: Either ask an organisation for their registration number, or use the directory on the NGO portal. The list of organisations can be filtered using a geographic filter.
